The below code was used to calculate the leaf stability index from phyutility.

```{r 54 lsi multiphylo}
library(phytools)

setwd("~/repo/aqhumor/AqHum_5Species/")
tree_dir_path = "aqhumor_final/jumble/54_jumble_search/output_54_jumble_search_processed/outtrees_54_jumble_search_processed/"

#create a multiphylo oject of 
multiphylo <- combine_multi_trees(tree_dir_path)
#write as nexus (required format for phylopytho)
writeNexus(multiphylo, "LSI_54_jumble_search.tre")
```

Run lsi on farnam
